content: **what you ll need** 3 50mm e crochet hook dk yarn 8ply tapestry needle **yarn** drops cotton light - green drops muskat - heather vanilla yellow **size** pattern is made for 0 - 6 months old changes for size 6- 12 months are in finished measurements sole length 0 - 6 month old 9cm 6 - 12 month old 10cm **gauge** 4 row & 5 stitches in half_double_crochet = 1 inch **stitches & abbreviations** st s stitch es chain chain stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease - single_crochet 2 together half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet hdc2tog - half_double_crochet 2 together double_crochet - double_crochet decrease - double_crochet 2 together
